headline: Jim Cramer on Chipotle: “Let’s Just Keep it on the Radar Screen”
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE:CMG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared insights on. A caller asked if it was a good idea to hold the stock or get rid of it. In response, Cramer remarked: “Oh boy, alright. There’s a lot of fundamental stories going on in the restaurant industry that is making […]
